rocky.teatime.database

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • rocky.teatime.database.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    The Database Helper class is the class primarily responsible for managing and creating the central database.
